12. Subroutines

12.1. Overview

The subroutines available are summarised below.

Name Purpose
FormatTime format a date-time value
AppendText within the on macro, appends text after the current line
PrependText within the on macro, prepends text before the current line
FindFile override this if you need custom searching rules

Further details on these are provided below.

AppendText

FindFile

FormatTime

PrependText
